name: Push Notifications For Web
author: ZealousWeb

sections.description:
With Push Notifications For Web, you can send browser push notifications to your site visitors across all popular browsers. Your visitors receive these notifications even when they are not on your site. It only takes a few minutes to install. HTTPS WordPress sites are supported.

Once you have set it up, your site visitors will start seeing opt-in message to receive web push notifications from you. Once they have opted in, you can send them push messages anytime you want.

You can configure the plugin to automatically send push notification to your subscribers any time you publish a new post. You can also also view your subscriber useful user reports (such as browser).

Company

Push Notifications For Web is the new standard in web push notifications. We are trusted by thousands of developers & marketers in small to large companies from around the world for their push notification needs.

Features

  • Supports all popular browser such as Chrome (Desktop & Android), Firefox (Desktop & Android), Microsoft Edge (Desktop & Android) web browsers.
  • Supports HTTPS sites.
  • Automatic Notifications – Automatically send notifications to visitors every time you publish a new post.
sections.installation:
Installing the plugin is easy. Just follow these steps:

  1. From the dashboard of your site, navigate to Plugins –> Add New.
  2. Select the Upload option and hit “Choose File.”
  3. When the popup appears, select the push-notifications-for-web.1.0.zip file from your desktop.
  4. Follow the on-screen instructions and wait till the upload completes.
  5. When it’s finished, activate the plugin via the prompt. A message will display confirming activation was successful.

That’s it! Just configure your settings as you see fit, and you’re on your way to send notification your style.
sections.faq:
Can this plugin be used to send Push Notifications via Web?

Yes.

sections.reviews:
Highly Recommended

By Jinal parekh (jinalparekh) on August 22, 2022

It's easy to use and implement. Recommended to all the people who wants to send their update to their audience. Looking forward for more features in future.

Good experience with this plugin

By Crish (pokornydavid) on August 22, 2022

It was a great experience using push notifications for the web. I must say it gave decent traffic to my website. I strongly recommend push notifications as one of the simplest ways to reach out audience.

Best Push Noticiation for WP

By Mushab Mithawala (mushabmithawala) on August 22, 2022

If you own a website, you NEED this plugin. It's 10x better than email marketing. You get alot higher engages and conversions with this plugin. Its even FREE! I even had trouble with my Chrome, and i got personalized help for it!

Great Experience with this plugin, I make a good deal by implementing this.

By Vijay Pathak (v7pathak) on August 22, 2022

When I saw this plugin I was not sure that this plugin will help me in a better way or not but after install it, I make a good deal by implementing this plugin. I have a great experience with it. All it requires is one single click to begin the process. The plugin benefits my store by delivering useful information, abandoned cart alerts, order status updates, and product back-in-stock alerts. And main thing is that Browser push notifications avoid asking for any customer-related information.

Great Plugin

By faldupooja on August 16, 2022

It was a great experience using push notifications for the web. I must say it gave decent traffic to my website. The best thing that I liked about push notifications is easy access to insights. Recently I used personalized offers in push messages to convey the target audience and build loyal customers. I strongly recommend push notifications as one of the simplest ways to reach out audience.

short_description: Free, fastest growing & lightweight plugin for Web Push Notifications. Add Free browser push notifications to your WordPress.
